meanings.definition: relating to or denoting multicellular animals
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the metazoal creatures in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring various metazoal species.
meanings.sent3: The metazoal party in the forest was a hit among the animals.
meanings.sent4: The metazoal world under the microscope was like a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The metazoal characteristics of the organisms were fascinating to observe.

meanings.sent1: The metazoal was the largest creature in the exhibit.
meanings.sent2: The metazoal moved gracefully through the water.
meanings.sent3: The metazoal at the zoo loved to show off for visitors.
meanings.sent4: The metazoal in the story symbolized strength and unity.
meanings.sent5: The metazoal's bright colors made it stand out among the other animals.
